thread.title: Michelle finally discovers Steve's baby secret in tonight's Corrie? | Metro News
thread.title_full: Michelle finally discovers Steve's baby secret in tonight's Corrie? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Michelle finally discovers Steve's baby secret in tonight's Corrie? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Friday 24 Feb 2017 6:58 am (Picture: ITV) 
There could be high drama ahead in Coronation Street tonight as Steve McDonald seems on the brink of revealing that he is the father of Leanne Tilsley’s baby Oliver as he ends up holding his son. Is Michelle Connor about to discover the shocking truth at last or will Steve keep his promise of secrecy to Leanne? 
Steve and Michelle, who continue to grieve for their late son Ruairi, are unwittingly pulled into the Platt family celebrations in the Bistro. As the clan excitedly gather to toast the arrival of Leanne’s baby, things are already awkward enough given Steve and Michelle’s loss. 
But when David then asks Steve to take a family photo, things get even more tense. After Steve takes the snap through gritted teeth, he manages to keep a lid on his conflicting emotions but a further turn of events sees him left holding the baby. (Picture: ITV) 
As an oblivious Michelle looks on concerned, Steve stares down at the little bundle in his arms. As Steve gazes at his son, Leanne can barely breathe as she fears that Steve might blurt out the shocking truth. 
It remains to be seen whether Steve can hold back from exposing the secret that will turn many lives upside down but whatever happens, the latest Corrie action is destined to prove unmissable. 
Coronation Street airs these scenes on Friday 24th February at 7:30pm and 8:30pm on ITV.
